description.english: Restore the current of Hanan.
description.german: Hanans Strom wiederherstellen.
description.french: Restaurer le courant de Hanan.
description.italian: Ripristina la corrente di Hanan.
description.spanish: Restaura la corriente de Hanan.
description.japanese: ハナンの電流を復元します。
description.portuguese: Restaure a corrente de Hanan.

description.english: Reach the Homestead of Hanan.
description.german: Er kommt in Hanans Hamlet an.
description.french: Il arrive au hameau de Hanan.
description.italian: Arriva al frazione di Hanan.
description.spanish: Llega al Caserío de Hanan.
description.schinese: 他到达了哈南的小村庄。
description.japanese: 彼はハナンの集落に到着します。
description.portuguese: Ele chega a Hanan's Hamlet.

description.english: Venture into the Land Beyond the Walls.
description.german: Abenteuer auf Erden jenseits der Wände.
description.french: Aventure sur terre au-delà des murs.
description.italian: Avventura sulla terra oltre le pareti.
description.spanish: Aventúrate en La Tierra Más Allá de las Murallas.
description.japanese: 壁を越えて地球上の冒険。
description.portuguese: Aventura na terra além dos muros.

description.english: Toll every small bell.
description.german: Berühren Sie alle kleinen Glocken.
description.french: Toucher toutes les petites cloches.
description.italian: Tocca tutte le piccole campane.
description.spanish: Toca todas las campanas pequeñas.
description.japanese: すべての小さな鐘に触れます。
description.portuguese: Toque em todos os sinos pequenos.

displayName.japanese: ベルタワーベルタワー

description.english: Toll the Belltower's Bell.
description.german: Berühren Sie die Glocke des Belltower Glocken -Turms.
description.french: Touchez la cloche du clocher Belltower.
description.italian: Tocca il campanello del campanello.
description.spanish: Toca la campana del Campanario Belltower.
description.schinese: 触摸贝尔塔尔钟楼的铃铛。
description.japanese: ベルタワーベルタワーの鐘に触れてください。
description.portuguese: Toque a campainha da torre do sino da Belltower.

description.english: Pick up the radio at the military tent.
description.german: Sammle das Radio im Militärgeschäft.
description.french: Récupérez la radio dans le magasin militaire.
description.italian: Raccogli la radio nel negozio militare.
description.spanish: Recoge la radio en la tienda militar.
description.japanese: 軍事店でラジオを集めます。
description.portuguese: Colete o rádio na loja militar.

description.english: Reach the highest point of Urzhum.
description.german: Es erreicht den höchsten Punkt von Urzhum.
description.french: Il atteint le point le plus élevé d'Urzhum.
description.italian: Raggiunge il punto più alto di Urzhum.
description.spanish: Alcanza el punto más alto de Urzhum.
description.japanese: ウルツハムの最高点に到達します。
description.portuguese: Atinge o ponto mais alto de Urzhum.

description.english: Obtain the flashlight.
description.german: Holen Sie sich die Taschenlampe.
description.french: Obtenez la lampe de poche.
description.italian: Ottieni la torcia.
description.spanish: Obtén la linterna.
description.japanese: 懐中電灯を入手してください。
description.portuguese: Pegue a lanterna.

description.english: Reach the city of Urzhum.
description.german: Es kommt in der Stadt Urzhum an.
description.french: Il arrive dans la ville d'Urzhum.
description.italian: Arriva nella città di Urzhum.
description.spanish: Llega a la ciudad de Urzhum.
description.japanese: ウルツハムの街に到着します。
description.portuguese: Chega à cidade de Urzhum.

description.english: Get back to your apartment in Urzhum.
description.german: Gehen Sie zurück in Ihre Wohnung in Urzhum.
description.french: Retournez dans votre appartement à Urzhum.
description.italian: Torna al tuo appartamento a Urzhum.
description.spanish: Vuelve a tu apartamento en Urzhum.
description.japanese: ウルツハムのアパートに戻ります。
description.portuguese: Volte para o seu apartamento em Urzhum.

description.english: Use the airship fast-travel system.
description.german: Verwenden Sie das Fast Aircraft Travel System.
description.french: Utilisez le système de voyage rapide des avions.
description.italian: Utilizzare il sistema di viaggio aeronautico veloce.
description.spanish: Usa el sistema de viaje rápido de la aeronave.
description.schinese: 使用快速飞机旅行系统。
description.japanese: 高速航空機旅行システムを使用します。
description.portuguese: Use o sistema de viagem de aeronave rápido.

description.english: Find the lost transcription at the abandoned port.
description.german: Finden Sie die verlorene Transkription im verlassenen Port.
description.french: Trouvez la transcription perdue dans le port abandonné.
description.italian: Trova la trascrizione persa nella porta abbandonata.
description.koreana: 버려진 항구에서 손실 된 전사를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Encuentra la transcripción perdida en el puerto abandonado.
description.schinese: 在废弃的港口找到丢失的转录。
description.japanese: 放棄されたポートで失われた転写を見つけます。
description.portuguese: Encontre a transcrição perdida no porto abandonado.

description.english: Restore the current of the theme park.
description.german: Stellen Sie den Strom des Themenparks wieder her.
description.french: Restaurez le courant du parc à thème.
description.italian: Ripristina la corrente del parco a tema.
description.spanish: Restaura la corriente del parque temático.
description.japanese: テーマパークの電流を復元します。
description.portuguese: Restaure a corrente do parque temático.

description.english: Reach the highest point of Iron Forest.
description.german: Es erreicht den höchsten Punkt des Eisenwaldes.
description.french: Il atteint le point le plus élevé de la forêt de fer.
description.italian: Raggiunge il punto più alto della foresta di ferro.
description.koreana: 그것은 가장 높은 철 숲에 도달합니다.
description.spanish: Alcanza el punto más alto de Iron Forest.
description.schinese: 它达到了铁森林的最高点。
description.japanese: 鉄の森の最高点に到達します。
description.portuguese: Atinge o ponto mais alto da floresta de ferro.

description.english: Ride the quicycle for 20 kilometres.
description.german: Monta der Quike für 20 Kilometer.
description.french: Monta le quike sur 20 kilomètres.
description.italian: MONTA la Quike per 20 chilometri.
description.spanish: Monta la cuatricicleta más de 20 kilómetros.
description.japanese: モンタは20キロメートルのQuike。
description.portuguese: Monta, o escalonamento por 20 quilômetros.

description.english: Reach the Verdurant Lair.
description.german: Es erreicht die Gemüsehöhle.
description.french: Il atteint la tanière végétale.
description.italian: Raggiunge la tana della tana vegetale.
description.spanish: Llega a la guarida de Verdurant Lair.
description.japanese: 野菜の隠れ家の巣に到達します。
description.portuguese: Chega ao covil de vegetais.

description.english: There is no going back.
description.german: Es gibt keinen Weg zurück.
description.french: Il n'y a pas de marche arrière.
description.italian: Non c'è via del ritorno.
description.spanish: No hay vuelta atrás.
description.japanese: 戻る方法はありません。
description.portuguese: Não há caminho de volta.

displayName.spanish: La Tierra Más Allá de los Mares

description.english: Reach the land Selene has moved on to.
description.german: Er erreicht das Land, zu dem Selene gegangen ist.
description.french: Il atteint le terrain auquel Sélène est allé.
description.italian: Raggiunge la terra a cui è andata Selene.
description.spanish: Llega a la tierra a la que se fué Selene.
description.schinese: 他到达了塞琳（Selene）去的土地。
description.japanese: 彼はセレネが行った土地に到達します。
description.portuguese: Ele chega à terra para a qual Selene foi.

description.english: Obtain the Iron Stilts that protect you from fall damage.
description.german: Holen Sie sich die Eisenschritte, die es vor Sturzschäden schützen.
description.french: Obtenez les progrès en fer qui le protègent des dégâts de chute.
description.italian: Ottieni i passi da ferro che lo proteggono dal danno da caduta.
description.koreana: 가을 손상으로부터 그것을 보호하는 철의 보폭을 얻으십시오.
description.spanish: Obtén los Zancos de Hierro que lo protejan del daño de caída.
description.schinese: 获得铁的迈进，以保护其免受秋天的伤害。
description.japanese: 秋のダメージからそれを保護する鉄のストライドを取得します。
description.portuguese: Faça os passos de ferro que o protegem dos danos causados ​​pelo outono.

description.english: Jump and survive a height of over 100 meters.
description.german: Es springt und überlebt in einer Höhe von mehr als 100 Metern.
description.french: Il saute et survit à une hauteur de plus de 100 mètres.
description.italian: Salta e sopravvive ad un'altezza di oltre 100 metri.
description.spanish: Salta y sobrevive a una altura de más de 100 metros.
description.schinese: 它可以跳跃并在100米以上的高度生存。
description.japanese: 100メートル以上の高さでジャンプして生き残ります。
description.portuguese: Ele salta e sobrevive a uma altura de mais de 100 metros.

description.english: Activate the old projector and unearth memories from the past.
description.german: Aktivieren Sie den alten Projektor und ignorieren Erinnerungen der Vergangenheit.
description.french: Activez l'ancien projecteur et ignorez les souvenirs du passé.
description.italian: Attiva il vecchio proiettore e ignora i ricordi del passato.
description.koreana: 오래된 프로젝터를 활성화하고 과거의 기억을 무시하십시오.
description.spanish: Activa el viejo proyector y desentierra recuerdos del pasado.
description.schinese: 激活旧的投影仪并无视过去的记忆。
description.japanese: 古いプロジェクターを活性化し、過去の記憶を無視します。
description.portuguese: Ative o antigo projetor e desconsidere as memórias do passado.

description.english: Embrace the future that has been placed upon you.
description.german: Akzeptiere die Zukunft, die dich hält.
description.french: Acceptez l'avenir qui vous tient.
description.italian: Accetta il futuro che ti tiene.
description.spanish: Acepta el futuro que te depara.
description.japanese: あなたを保持する未来を受け入れてください。
description.portuguese: Aceite o futuro que o segura.

description.english: Get all the achievements.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.
description.german: Holen Sie sich alle Erfolge.
description.french: Obtenez toutes les réalisations.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i risultati.
description.japanese: すべての成果を取得します。
description.portuguese: Obtenha todas as conquistas.
